post.title: panasonic lumix l10 review discussion
post.content: the second full-featured digital slr from panasonic is the new lumix dmc-l10. and while panasonic is a relative newcomer to the slr marketplace, the l10 packs an impressive set of features and a very interesting lens into one unique camera kit. read on for our full review!read the full content of this article: panasonic lumix l10 review
